vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.23.8;
son of Ladan (H3936I) ;
brother of: Joel (H3100O), Jehiel (H3171H)
§ Zetham = "olive"
a Gershonite Levite, the son of Jehieli and grandson of Laadan
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Ladán; levita; en tiempos del rey David
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
細坦 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "橄欖"
一名革順的利未人, 耶希伊利的兒子, 拉但的孫子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
细坦 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "橄榄"
一名革顺的利未人, 耶希伊利的儿子, 拉但的孙子
